interview_metadata.general_comments: Rick Rule discusses the long-term commodity supercycle, drivers for gold, silver, and uranium, and the disconnect between metal prices and mining equities. He stresses the importance of management and operating excellence, highlights sector undervaluation, and provides detailed commentary and ownership status for 10 silver, 10 gold, 10 copper, and 10 uranium stocks. Rick also shares views on political risk, management track record, and jurisdictional catalysts affecting individual company fortunes.
